root.name: Ankh: Battle of the Gods
root.description: PC System requirementsWindows XP/Vista3 GHz Pentium 4 or 2.4 GHz Athlon (3.0 GHz recommended for both)512 MB RAM (1 GB recommended)DirectX 9.0c-compatible video card with 238 MB RAM (256 RAM recommended) - MX series and XGI Volari are not supported1 GB free hard drive space
